document_data.name: Drowning Death
document_data.mainbody: '''''Drowning Death''''' was the favored weapon of the [[Faer√ªn]]ian sea goddess [[Umberlee]], wielded by her [[avatar]] form.
document_data.Powers: According to some sources, this [[trident]] was a ''+5'' weapon that had the properties of ''[[Frost (property)|frost]]'', ''[[keen]],'' and ''[[thundering]]''. While others reported that it was a ''+3 trident'' that, while wielded by Umberlee, mimicked the effects of a ''[[trident of fish command]]'' and a ''[[trident of submission]]''.
